name: Witching Hour (kadzu)
description:
Witching Hour, gamejam for agdg. A bad fps about being a witch trapped in a  dungeon.

Your goal is to kill the skeleton with a hat and cape, good luck.

Default Controls

  • Q - Dash in the your current movement direction
  • E - Ability 1 (Fire Touch)
  • F - Ability 2 (Fireball)
  • G - Ability 3 (Ice Shards)

Everything was made during the jam, if you liked the music you can find more at https://soundcloud.com/kadzu
